sourcesContent:
import { Container, Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap";

function Filter({ categories, brands, onCategoryChange, onBrandChange }) {
  return (
    <Container>
      <Dropdown>
        <Dropdown.Toggle variant="success" id="filter-dropdown">
          Filter
        </Dropdown.Toggle>
        <Dropdown.Menu>
          <Dropdown.Item onClick={() => onCategoryChange("all")}>
            All Categories
          </Dropdown.Item>
          <Dropdown.Divider />

          <Dropdown.Item onClick={() => onCategoryChange("newArrival")}>
            New Arrival
          </Dropdown.Item>
          <Dropdown.Item onClick={() => onCategoryChange("special")}>
            Special
          </Dropdown.Item>
          <Dropdown.Item onClick={() => onCategoryChange("noodle")}>
            Noodle
          </Dropdown.Item>
          <Dropdown.Item onClick={() => onCategoryChange("snack")}>
            Snack
          </Dropdown.Item>
          <Dropdown.Item onClick={() => onCategoryChange("sauce")}>
            Sauce
          </Dropdown.Item>

          <Dropdown.Divider />
          <Dropdown.Header>Brands</Dropdown.Header>
          {brands.map((brand) => (
            <Dropdown.Item key={brand} onClick={() => onBrandChange(brand)}>
              {brand}
            </Dropdown.Item>
          ))}
        </Dropdown.Menu>
      </Dropdown>
    </Container>
  );
}

export default Filter;
